comments:
Description:
Assertion error when render attached report.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Using reportrunner to run attached report


Result:
SEVERE: Error happened while running the report.
java.lang.AssertionError
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.ir.PageSetupDesign.getMasterPage(PageSetupDesign.java:62)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.presentation.HTMLPaginationBuilder.buildPageContent(HTMLPaginationBuilder.java:74)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.presentation.DefaultPaginationEmitter.createPageContent(DefaultPaginationEmitter.java:610)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.presentation.DefaultPaginationEmitter.createPage(DefaultPaginationEmitter.java:538)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.presentation.DefaultPaginationEmitter.getCurrentPage(DefaultPaginationEmitter.java:555)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.presentation.DefaultPaginationEmitter.startTable(DefaultPaginationEmitter.java:331)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.TableItemExecutor.execute(TableItemExecutor.java:148)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ReportExecutorVisitor.visitTableItem(ReportExecutorVisitor.java:205)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.ir.TableItemDesign.accept(TableItemDesign.java:69)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ReportExecutor.execute(ReportExecutor.java:129)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ReportExecutor.execute(ReportExecutor.java:89)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.RunAndRenderTask.run(RunAndRenderTask.java:171)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.runAndRenderReport(ReportRunner.java:238)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.execute(ReportRunner.java:164)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.main(ReportRunner.java:120)

This issue is not a regression, the report design has been change. The master-page definition has been removed from the design file. 

As the designer never create such a report design, it will be fixed in future.

Fixed.

If there is no master page, set a default one.
